text: Donald Craig Stewart (1928–2009) was a Canadian politician. He represented the electoral district of Marquette in the House of Commons from 1968 to 1979. He was a member of the Progressive Conservative Party. ==Electoral record== ==External links== * Category:1928 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Manitoba Category:Progressive Conservative Party of Canada MPs Category:People from Portage la Prairie
title: Craig Stewart (politician)
